lines.comment: loop 11 times; during each iteration, calculate factorial( i ) and display result.
recursive definition of function factorial.
base case. If number is less than or equal to 1, factorial returns 1, no further recursion is necessary.
recursive step. If number is greater than 1, the statement expresses the problem as   the product of number and a recursive call to factorial evaluating the factorial of number-1.
obtain integer from user.
calculate fibonacci value for number input by user.
Recursive definition of function fibonacci.
base case. Each time fibonacci is invoked, it immediately tests for the base case, n is equal to 0 or 1. If this is true, n is returned.
recursive step. If n is greater than 1, the recursion step generates two recursive calls.
